Structure# AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOS

```
struct AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags
```

## [Topics](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreampropertyflags#topics)

### [Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreampropertyflags#Constants)

[`static var cacheProperty: AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreampropertyflags/cacheproperty)A property listener sets this flag to instruct the parser to cache the property value so that it remains available after the callback returns.[`static var propertyIsCached: AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreampropertyflags/propertyiscached)This flag is set when the callback [`AudioFileStream_PropertyListenerProc`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestream_propertylistenerproc) is invoked in the case that the value of the property has been cached and can be obtained later.### [Initializers](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreampropertyflags#Initializers)
